entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (npe_scout1_guard.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_11: Creatures in the room behind me. I'm not sure how they got out of their cages, and I don't know what they were...some sort of cat. I managed to crawl out of there and I sealed the cargo bay door behind me.
entries.s_12: Thank you for your help. A medic is going to be sent to me soon.
entries.s_14: What can I do to help?
entries.s_16: Raylen needs to know what these...things are. If you can get one of their hides, that will help. He will know what to do.
entries.s_18: How do I get a hide?
entries.s_20: Kill a couple and harvest the hide from their corpses. I have them trapped in the room next to me. Don't forget that you will need at least one intact hide.
entries.s_24: Be careful in there. They sound hungry.
entries.s_26: I'm in a bit of pain here. I was attacked in that room. Please find a medic.
entries.s_5: Please get to Rylen with a harvested hide.
entries.s_7: I hope you don't need much help. I'm not going to be able to hold a blaster.
entries.s_9: Raylen sent me. What did this to you?!
